Waterfront Icons.

Government Backed.

The master developer that redefined Dubai’s shoreline with Palm Jumeirah, Palm Jebel Ali, Dubai Islands and The World—creating world‑class destinations for luxury living, tourism and investment.

Coastline added to Dubai
🌊 300 +
Palm Jebel Ali island area
📐 13.4 km²
Additional coastline from Palm Jebel Ali
🏝️ 110 B
AED strategic financing
💰 17 B

Why

Nakheel?

A government‑backed, scale developer delivering trophy waterfronts and large‑format communities that anchor Dubai’s global profile.

Waterfront Mastery

Creator of iconic coastal landmarks and long beaches at city scale.

Government Backed

Part of Dubai Holding Real Estate since 2024 reinforcing stability and vision.

High ROI Stock

Prime waterfront addresses historically associated with resilient yields.

Flagship Megaprojects
Palm Jebel Ali and Dubai Islands expand the beachfront supply pipeline.
Destination Assets
Retail & leisure anchors like Dragon Mart and Ibn Battuta Mall drive footfall.
Investor Confidence

Strengthened by multi‑billion‑dirham financing for future phases.

Waterfront Mastery

Creator of iconic coastal landmarks and long beaches at city scale.

Government Backed
Part of Dubai Holding Real Estate since 2024 reinforcing stability and vision.
High ROI Stock

Prime waterfront addresses historically associated with resilient yields.

Flagship Megaprojects
Palm Jebel Ali and Dubai Islands expand the beachfront supply pipeline.
Destination Assets
Retail & leisure anchors like Dragon Mart and Ibn Battuta Mall drive footfall.
Investor Confidence

Strengthened by multi‑billion‑dirham financing for future phases.

Palm Jumeirah · Palm Jebel Ali

Dubai Islands · The World

These master‑plans scale beachfront supply while preserving scarcity value in prime zones.

○ Palm Jumeirah— global icon of resort living, marinas and luxury residences.

○ Palm Jebel Ali — ~13.4 km², ~110 km of coastline; new urban and leisure anchor.

○ Dubai Islands— five interconnected islands reimagining Deira’s waterfront.

○ The World Islands— The World Islands

Waterfront Premiums

Established addresses like Palm Jumeirah have delivered resilient rental yields and capital growth over cycles.

Financing Power

AED 17bn in strategic financing, including AED 6bn for new projects, supports delivery momentum.

Strategic Alignment

Post‑2024 consolidation under Dubai Holding Real Estate unlocks synergies with destination‑makers like Meraas.

Key

Notes

Company Snapshot

Nakheel has added 300+ km to Dubai’s original coastline through its waterfront portfolio.

Government Backed

In March 2024, Nakheel and Meydan were incorporated into Dubai Holding under the leadership of H.H. Sheikh Ahmed bin Saeed Al Maktoum.

Funding & Outlook

AED 17bn financing (incl. AED 6bn for new projects) accelerates Palm Jebel Ali, Dubai Islands and other large waterfront phases.

Active Destinations

Beyond waterfronts, the portfolio spans International City, Jumeirah Islands and destination retail such as Dragon Mart and Ibn Battuta Mall.
